name: ROOTS OF HERITAGE
description:
-ROOTS OF HERITAGE-

You have inherited of a new piece of land from your grandmother. Upon arrival, what you expected to be a nice summer farmhouse turned out to be a hellscape of gigantic outgrown roots. Armed with only your trusty pocket knife, slice through the thick vegetation and discover what kind of secrets have been festering here for the last couple decades. 

Some say that a constant clucking can be heard from the depths of the terrain, locals still fear that a great danger is sealed away in there.

Controls :
ZQSD - Move (QWERTY support currently bugged)
Space - Jump
LMB/RMB - Move camera left and right
Scroll up.down - Move camera up and down
Mouse movement - Slash and stroke

Kevin Rouillard - Character designer/Animator
Isaac Charlet - Rigger/Animator
Alan Coeugnet - Environment and Tech artist
Dorian Helie - Environment and Tech artist
Lisa Miloche - Game Designer/Level Designer
Thomas Vignes - Developer/Gameplay Designer
